greeting.h3: The International Urban and Infrastructure Research Center is advancing research for people in the areas of cities, transportation, environment, and disasters in the era of the 4th industrial revolution.
jobs: Research on the planning, installation, and operation of infrastructure facilities
Response research related to natural and social disasters
Development of measurement equipment based on AI
Research on urban regeneration and response to urban shrinkage
